wines.description: A distinguished 2019 bottling that presents tobacco and blackberry. Ideal for both casual sipping and special occasions.

tastingNotes.aroma: The nose opens with intense aromas of floral and dark fruits, followed by layered notes of spice. With time in the glass, additional layers emerge, adding depth and intrigue to the aromatic profile.
tastingNotes.palate: On the palate, balanced takes center stage, complemented by structured and fruit-forward. The smooth texture and integrated structure create a compelling drinking experience that showcases both fruit purity and winemaking skill.
tastingNotes.finish: The long finish is refined and elegant, leaving a lasting impression. This wine demonstrates excellent aging potential and will continue to evolve with time.

wineDetails.ageability: Drink now through 2030, with potential for further development

wines.description: From the 2023 vintage, expect vanilla and plum. Represents excellent value for this quality level.

tastingNotes.aroma: The nose opens with subtle aromas of spice and oak, followed by nuanced notes of earth. With time in the glass, additional layers emerge, adding depth and intrigue to the aromatic profile.
tastingNotes.palate: On the palate, complex takes center stage, complemented by balanced and structured. The polished texture and cohesive structure create a compelling drinking experience that showcases both fruit purity and winemaking skill.
tastingNotes.finish: The extended finish is polished and persistent, leaving a lasting impression. This wine demonstrates excellent aging potential and will continue to evolve with time.

wineDetails.ageability: Drink now through 2030, with potential for further development

wines.description: This 2018 selection delivers cinnamon and spicy. Shows the hallmark characteristics of its terroir.

tastingNotes.aroma: The nose opens with vibrant aromas of cinnamon and bramble, followed by expressive notes of jammy berries. With time in the glass, additional layers emerge, adding depth and intrigue to the aromatic profile.
tastingNotes.palate: On the palate, spicy takes center stage, complemented by full-bodied and bold. The refined texture and elegant structure create a compelling drinking experience that showcases both fruit purity and winemaking skill.
tastingNotes.finish: The enduring finish is sophisticated and warm, leaving a lasting impression. This wine demonstrates excellent aging potential and will continue to evolve with time.

wineDetails.ageability: Drink now through 2030, with potential for further development

wines.description: This 2020 expression showcases blackcurrant and full-bodied. Perfect for current enjoyment or short-term cellaring.

tastingNotes.aroma: The nose opens with delicate aromas of dark fruits and spice, followed by pure notes of oak. With time in the glass, additional layers emerge, adding depth and intrigue to the aromatic profile.
tastingNotes.palate: On the palate, structured takes center stage, complemented by fruit-forward and complex. The silky texture and well-balanced structure create a compelling drinking experience that showcases both fruit purity and winemaking skill.
tastingNotes.finish: The persistent finish is graceful and elegant, leaving a lasting impression. This wine demonstrates excellent aging potential and will continue to evolve with time.

wineDetails.ageability: Drink now through 2030, with potential for further development

wines.description: Crafted in 2022, this wine reveals cedar and firm tannins. A wine that balances tradition with modern winemaking.

tastingNotes.aroma: The nose opens with pronounced aromas of oak and earth, followed by complex notes of floral. With time in the glass, additional layers emerge, adding depth and intrigue to the aromatic profile.
tastingNotes.palate: On the palate, balanced takes center stage, complemented by structured and fruit-forward. The velvety texture and harmonious structure create a compelling drinking experience that showcases both fruit purity and winemaking skill.
tastingNotes.finish: The lingering finish is elegant and persistent, leaving a lasting impression. This wine demonstrates excellent aging potential and will continue to evolve with time.

wineDetails.ageability: Drink now through 2030, with potential for further development

wines.productName: Domaine de la Denante Bourgogne Chardonnay 2023
wines.description: A distinguished 2023 bottling that presents butter and peach. Ideal for both casual sipping and special occasions.

tastingNotes.aroma: The nose opens with intense aromas of tropical fruits and apple, followed by layered notes of citrus. With time in the glass, additional layers emerge, adding depth and intrigue to the aromatic profile.
tastingNotes.palate: On the palate, mineral takes center stage, complemented by creamy and peach. The smooth texture and integrated structure create a compelling drinking experience that showcases both fruit purity and winemaking skill.
tastingNotes.finish: The long finish is refined and crisp, leaving a lasting impression. This wine demonstrates excellent aging potential and will continue to evolve with time.

wineDetails.ageability: Drink now through 2030, with potential for further development

wines.productName: Libertine Old Wagon Road Vineyard Chardonnay 2021
wines.description: Crafted in 2021, this wine reveals citrus and peach. A wine that balances tradition with modern winemaking.

tastingNotes.aroma: The nose opens with pronounced aromas of butter and vanilla, followed by complex notes of tropical fruits. With time in the glass, additional layers emerge, adding depth and intrigue to the aromatic profile.
tastingNotes.palate: On the palate, mineral takes center stage, complemented by creamy and peach. The velvety texture and harmonious structure create a compelling drinking experience that showcases both fruit purity and winemaking skill.
tastingNotes.finish: The lingering finish is elegant and clean, leaving a lasting impression. This wine demonstrates excellent aging potential and will continue to evolve with time.
